text:
I don’t have experience with that particular boilerplate, but I have used and can recommend the <https://github.com/emptypockets-dev/create-HubSpot-project|create-HubSpot-project boilerplate> as a starter with Tailwind preconfigured, as well as some handy HubSpot and HubL tools.

It hasn’t been updated in a few years, so you’ll need to upgrade PostCSS, Tailwind, and their associated plugins to newer versions before you actually get started.
